title: Is ashe support the new Thing?
body: I've experienced and have seen watching streams of lately there seems to be alot of support ashe being played is there a reason to this?

replies.body: season 3 called, they want their support back.
Although I think she is a pretty mediocre support, it isn't a new thing.

Ashe support is very mediocre, I honestly think supp tf is better if you are decent at PaC and can make the right calls, also place gate in the right spot. 

40cdr - full tank - stun card every 2 seconds - global tp.
